  22. ‌type[@warning "-37"] res = Ok of Obj.t | Err of string

  24. external ndl_run_toplevel: string -> string -> res
  25.   = "caml_natdynlink_run_toplevel"

  27. ‌let lookup sym =
  28.   Dynlink.unsafe_get_global_value ~bytecode_or_asm_symbol:sym

  30. ‌let need_symbol sym =
  31.   Option.is_none (Dynlink.unsafe_get_global_value ~bytecode_or_asm_symbol:sym)

  33. ‌let dll_run dll entry =
  34.   match (try Result (Obj.magic (ndl_run_toplevel dll entry))
  35.          with exn -> Exception exn)
  36.   with
  37.     | Exception _ as r -> r
  38.     | Result r ->
  39.         match Obj.magic r with
  40.           | Ok x -> Result x
  41.           | Err s -> fatal_error ("Toploop.dll_run " ^ s)

  58. ‌  let max_sensible_number_of_arguments =
  59.     (* The "-1" is to allow for a potential closure environment parameter. *)
  60.     Proc.max_arguments_for_tailcalls - 1

  62. ‌let backend = (module Backend : Backend_intf.S)

  64. let load ppf phrase_name program =
  65.   let dll =
  66.     if !Clflags.keep_asm_file then phrase_name ^ ext_dll
  67.     else Filename.temp_file ("caml" ^ phrase_name) ext_dll
  68.   in
  69.   let filename = Filename.chop_extension dll in
  70.   let middle_end =
  71.     if Config.flambda then Flambda_middle_end.lambda_to_clambda
  72.     else Closure_middle_end.lambda_to_clambda
  73.   in
  74.   Asmgen.compile_implementation ~toplevel:need_symbol
  75.     ~backend ~prefixname:filename
  76.     ~middle_end ~ppf_dump:ppf program;
  77.   Asmlink.call_linker_shared [filename ^ ext_obj] dll;
  78.   Sys.remove (filename ^ ext_obj);

  80.   let dll =
  81.     if Filename.is_implicit dll
  82.     then Filename.concat (Sys.getcwd ()) dll
  83.     else dll in
  84.   let remove_dll () =
  85.     (* note: under windows, cannot remove a loaded dll
  86.        (should remember the handles, close them in at_exit, and then
  87.        remove files) *)
  88.     try Sys.remove dll with Sys_error _ -> ()
  89.   in
  90.   match
  91.     dll_run dll phrase_name
  92.   with
  93.   | res ->
  94.      remove_dll ();
  95.      res
  96.   | exception x ->
  97.      record_backtrace ();
  98.      remove_dll ();
  99.      Exception x

  101. type lookup_fn = string -> Obj.t option
  102. type load_fn =
  103.   Format.formatter -> string -> Lambda.program -> Topcommon.evaluation_outcome
  104. type assembler = {mutable lookup: lookup_fn; mutable load: load_fn}

  106. let fns = {lookup; load}

  108. let load ppf = fns.load ppf

  110. let lookup sym = fns.lookup sym

  112. let register_loader ~lookup ~load =
  113.   fns.lookup <- lookup;
  114.   fns.load <- load
